text: What Can You Build With Node.js?
description: Node.js uses an event-driven, non-blocking model.It can handle many connections at once without waiting for one to finish before starting another.
Web servers and websites, REST APIs, , Real-time apps (like chat), Command-line tools, Working with files and databases , IoT and hardware control

text: Examples Running in the Command Line Interface
description: You can use them by importing them with require().
npm is the package manager for Node.js.
